verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: red sox] [V: hope] [ARG1: their rituals will carry them through world series] major league baseball players have some of the most elaborate rituals in pro sports and the red sox are no exception with the sox slated to appear in their fourth world series in 14 years tuesday night we took a look at a few roster quirks that ’ll make you smile or furrow your brow kimbrel wings houston supercuts astros j d martinez nesn dodgers baseball jd martinez red sox sox brock holt mlb houston astros ian kinsler brewers craig kimbrel boston red sox world series
